__e: Jeanne! You said I'd have my own room.

Well, Joan and I won't be coming into your restaurant
That's it. Also, Joan... everybody... don't surprise the family with information you haven't agreed upon.
Thank you. You know what happened as soon as Jan and me got the call, the very instant we got saved?
To be there, as Joan, until you see
